text: A tall man appeared from out of the shadow of the pillar that the kunai had struck.
My apologies. I didn't mean to hide.

name: Jisai
text: Be careful, Fumaー
Shishigami said quietly and got into a fighting stance.
The man showed no signs of hostility and was smiling peacefully.
But Shishigami didn't seem to have the slightest intention of letting her guard down.

name: Me
text: (Hmm, this guy isー)
Yes, I knew this man's face very well.

name: Me
text: It's youーGaku Shonosuke. What a surprise to meet you here.

name: Shonosuke
text: It has been a while, Kotaro-sama. Really, it is quite unexpected.
Shonosuke bowed gracefully to me.

name: Jisai
text: ...Do you know that guy?

name: Me
text: Yeah... He's a high-level underboss of the Nisha Clan you've heard so much about lately.
His name was Gaku Shonosukeー
He was on the same level as their other skilled Taimanin, such as the spear-wielding Dobashi Gonza or "Mermaid's Sapphire Eyes" Yao Bikuni.
He was a dual-wielding swordsman who specialized in Iaijutsu and used the same Falcon Jutsu as Headmistress Asagiー
He was known for using his Falcon Jutsu, with specialized movement of both arms, to draw his two swords with unbelievable speed.

name: Shonosuke
text: Yes, you're right. I'm a servant of the Nisha Clan who has now, regrettably, become your enemy.

name: Shonosuke
text: Because of that, it was a little difficult for me to show my face in front of you, Kotaro-samaー

name: Me
text: Are you trying to say that's the reason why you were hiding...?

name: Shonosuke
text: In the end... yes, that's how it goes, hm.
With no sign of remorse, Shonosuke nodded.

name: Shonosuke
text: I had no idea my presence would be noticed.

name: Shonosuke
text: That masked girl seems to have wonderful "eyes" and "ears."
Shishigami still remained wary of Shonosuke.

name: Me
text: (Well, I guess that's only natural...)
After all, the adversary was a Taimanin and underboss of Nisha, who had started the rebellion.
Of course, I didn't let my guard down either and asked Shonosuke in a firm voice.

name: Me
text: Was this trap aimed at me, Shonosuke?

name: Shonosuke
text: At you...?

name: Me
text: That stupid Gaiza surely knows that I came back to life, right?

name: Me
text: And, having not learned his lesson, he sent you here. Is that the purpose of this trap?

name: Shonosuke
text: No, it's not like that at all.

name: Me
text: Well, I guess there's no way you'd answer honestly. If you came to kill me, that is.

name: Shonosuke
text: Hehe, we're in a bind, huh...
Shonosuke shrugged with a bitter smile.

name: Shonosuke
text: I am not an assassin. The fact that you or that girl would come to this store was entirely unforeseen to meー

name: Shonosuke
text: Whether you believe me or not is all up to you.

name: Me
text: Hmm...

name: Me
text: (He's certainly right about thatー)
I had come to this store because of the errand for Kiryu-senseiーwhich meant that it was a complete coincidence.
In the unlikely event that Kiryu-sensei had been in contact with Shonosuke then it might have been possible to set a trap for me.
However, it was hard to imagine that that troublemaker-and-a-half would cooperate with anyone other than Murasaki-sensei...

name: Me
text: Well, I guess I'll believe you.

name: Shonosuke
text: Glad to hear that. An unnecessary conflict has been avoided.
Looking at Shonosuke, who was grinning in amusement, Shishigami whispered in a hushed voice.

name: Jisai
text: (Is it really okay to believe someone from the Nisha Clan, Fuma?)

name: Me
text: (I don't completely trust him. It's simply "for the time being.")

name: Jisai
text: (For the time being...?)

name: Me
text: (Yeah. As long as Shonosuke doesn't make any strange moves, we'll wait and see.)
Besides, we currently had more pressing matters at hand.

name: Me
text: So, Shonosuke, you had nothing to do with this trap, right?
I turned back toward Shonosuke and asked him.
Regardless of what Shonosuke's true intentions were, if we didn't get out of here it wasn't worth discussing.

name: Shonosuke
text: No... To be exact, I can't say I had "nothing" to do with it.

name: Me
text: Oh? What do you mean?

name: Shonosuke
text: This trap was intended for me. Which means, the two of you just happened to get caught in it... I guess that would be the whole truth to it.

name: Me
text: Intended for you...?
This was a baffling explanation. But just when I was about to ask for more detailsー

name: Jisai
text: Watch out, Fuma!! Will-o'-wisps!!

name: Me
text: Will-o'-wispsー!!?
When I looked up due to Shishigami's piercing voice, things resembling black vortices were forming all over the store.
Countless Will-o'-wisps were trying to crawl out from them.

name: Will-o'-wisp
text: GRR-ROOOOOOOOGHHH...!!

name: Me
text: Hey, hey. Are those things still appearing...?

name: Shonosuke
text: It really seems to be that kind of trap.

name: Shonosuke
text: No matter how strong one is, their skills will falter if fatigue builds up. That is what this trap is aiming for. It is quite clever.

name: Me
text: This is not the time to be impressed!! We'll talk about this later!! Find the monster that's controlling them, both of you!!

name: Jisai
text: Got it.

name: Shonosuke
text: So for now we are on the same side. ーUnderstood.
